C

close() - Method in interface org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileIterator
Closes the FileIterator object, releasing resources immediately.

F

FileIterator - Interface in org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil
An iterator over a directory.
FileUtil - Class in org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil
Provides extensions to the java.io.File class.
FileUtil() - Constructor for class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Creates a new FileUtil instance.

G

getFreeSpace(File) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Return the amount of free bytes available in the directory or file referenced by the File Object.
getTotalSpace(File) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Return the size in bytes of the partition denoted by the File Object.

H

hasNext() - Method in interface org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileIterator
Returns true if the next method would return a File object in the directory.

L

listFiles(File) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Returns a FileIterator object, used to traverse the contents of the directory denoted by the File argument.
listFiles(File, FileFilter) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Returns a FileIterator object, used to traverse the contents of the directory denoted by the File argument.
listFiles(File, FilenameFilter) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Returns a FileIterator object, used to traverse the contents of the directory denoted by the File argument.

N

next() - Method in interface org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileIterator
Returns the next File object in the directory.

O

org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil - package org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil
 

R

recycle(File) - Method in class org.jdesktop.jdic.fileutil.FileUtil
Sends the file or directory denoted by this abstract pathname to the Recycle Bin/Trash Can.
